pos_mean_info_list.mean: 能生产的；生产的，生产性的；多产的；富有成效的
生产力；生产率；生产能力
赢利性；生产率，生产能力；多产性

word_mean_info__list.difference: 一般指工业产品，也可泛指各种各样的产品。
一般指机器大量制造的产品。
含义广泛，不同场合有不同的意思，可表示“产品，产物”，尤指人类智力或艺术劳动的产品。
多指农产品(尤指蔬菜水果等)。

word_group.brief_definition: 个人护理产品；个人护理用品；个人护肤品
消费品；消费类产品；消费产品
新产品；新型产品；新产物
产品宣传；产品软性广告
产品差异化销售策略；产品特色化销售策略

bilingual.target: 每个产品的质量都很重要。

bilingual.source: You can also compare the prices of the same product.
bilingual.target: 你还可以比较同一产品的价格。

bilingual.source: The department held a meeting to discuss how to promote the new product.
bilingual.target: 部门召开会议讨论如何推广新产品。

bilingual.source: Omar has to give a presentation to his colleagues at work about the new product.
bilingual.target: 奥马尔必须向他的同事们介绍新产品。

bilingual.source: The product manager creates the product development plan.
bilingual.target: 产品经理制定产品的开发计划。
这个产品是认证的有机产品。

list.abstract: product，英文单词，可作名词，翻译为产品、结果、乘积、作品等。

yingyinNormal.en: I see you're also a customer. Are you satisfied with our product? She's very realistic. Thank you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我了解到你也是我们公司的顾客。对我们的产品满意么？很是逼真。谢谢你们的产品。

yingyinNormal.en: Sooner or later, the pests evolve resistance to every new product.
yingyinNormal.zh: 迟早这些昆虫能进化出对任何新产品的免疫能力。

yingyinNormal.en: Emma is a product of a bottle of merlot and a five year old condom.
yingyinNormal.zh: 艾玛只不过是一瓶红酒跟一个过期保险套的产品。

yingyinNormal.en: Our client has spent $400 million on R&D for a product that is feeding the world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们的委托人花了4个亿研究开发可以喂饱全世界的产品。

yingyinNormal.en: And Bear. What about Bear? They have some reprehensible product. Okay. Bear will trade with anybody.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那贝尔斯登公司呢？那也有些垃圾产品。可以，贝尔斯登肯定来者不拒。

yingyinNormal.en: Entire divisions within the government are using versions of his product, which makes him a prime target for hackers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 政府部门的整个机构都在用他的产品，所以他是黑客的主要目标。

yingyinNormal.en: You supply a service. Yes. Traditionally, higher education is a product marketed only to the elite.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是在提供服务。是的，传统意义上，高等教育是一项只为精英人群服务的产品。

yingyinNormal.en: You take an onion that has a price point of maybe 32 cents per pound, and you turn it into this product. This is an onion?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你拿一个洋葱，大约每磅32美分，然后把它变成这种产品。这是个洋葱?

yingyinNormal.en: And I would rather gamble on our vision than make a me-too product. We got to make the small things just unforgettable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我也不想押宝在你们的眼光上做一个人有我有的产品，我们得做点让人印象深刻的小东西

yingyinNormal.en: Let me make something clear up front. I want to stay, but with this product manufacturing lawsuit, I need to know where we stand.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我先表明态度，我想留下，但是鉴于这起产品制造的诉讼，我得知道目前的进展如何。

yingyinNormal.en: We take grain that wouldn't be very readily consumable by people and transform that into a marketable product in the form of finished beef.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们获得粮食，那些品质达不到食用标准的粮食，把它们变成工业产品，最终变成牛肉。

yingyinNormal.en: Think of any product, any organization, or any person you know, and you will see that this is true for them. Evolution is simply a process of either adapting, or dying.
yingyinNormal.zh: 想想任何产品，机构，你认识的人，你就会看到确实如此。进化只不过是适者生存。

yingyinNormal.en: This philosophy is key to Facebook. It may seem like a simple website. But it's really a completely new type of product.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而这个理念就是脸书的关键所在。 它可能看起来只是一个简单的网站，但却是一种完全新型的产品，也要承担很多责任。

yingyinNormal.en: I also would love to take this opportunity to present you a small innovative product which we design, because we are E-commerce company, online payment to buy things is always a big headache.
yingyinNormal.zh: 同时我想借助这个机会，演示一个阿里巴巴开发的新产品，因为我们经营的是电子商务，在线支付有时是件头疼的事。

yingyinNormal.en: This is the engineering department of a company that's worth nearly $80 billion, a company that's growing by 100% each year while building a product that no one had even heard of a decade ago, Facebook.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是一个公司里的工程部，价值几乎达到了800个亿，一个每年以两倍的速度发展的公司，制造一项十几年来闻所未闻的新兴产品，脸书。

yingyinNormal.en: Because you're innocent? No. I was moving product on February 26.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为你是无辜的吗？不，因为我是在26号干的。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Joshua, I would not describe your product testing as perfected.
yingyinNormal.zh: 约书亚先生，测试的结果并不如人意。

yingyinNormal.en: Be sure to be careful when you remove them, the product is very powerful.
yingyinNormal.zh: 取出的时候千万小心，那玩意威力可大了。

yingyinNormal.en: Other people, let me sell the product for 2.5 and charge 2.5 for shipping.
yingyinNormal.zh: 向令一部分人要价2.5美金邮费2.5美金。

yingyinNormal.en: Objection. Work product, Your Honor. Mr. Asher worked with the prosecution.
yingyinNormal.zh: 反对，工作成果，法官阁下，亚瑟先生曾跟控方一起工作。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 作品；产品；积；结果；产物；物产；产儿

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 新产品；新型产品；新产物

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>product</highlight> they're selling is data, and we, the users, convert our lives to data for the benefit of the digital giants.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们销售的产品是数据，而我们作为用户，为了数字巨头的利益，将我们的生活转化为数据。

examination_example.sentence: On one hand, that viewpoint is a logical <highlight>product</highlight> of America's evolution.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一方面，这种观点是美国进化的逻辑产物。

examination_example.sentence: Second, customers may be willing to buy a company's <highlight>products</highlight> as an indirect way to donate to the good causes it helps.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第二，客户可能愿意购买公司的产品，以此作为对其帮助的公益事业进行捐赠的间接方式。

sense_info_list.en: a quantity obtained by multiplying one number by another

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指体力劳动和脑力劳动所产生的东西，多指工业品，有时也可指经加工的农产品，含义比produce广些，是可数名词。
为未加工的农产品、天然产品或工业品的总称，是不可数名词。
指总产量，也指诗歌、绘画等文学艺术作品。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: At other times, we personify <highlight>products</highlight> in an effort to understand them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在其他时候，我们将产品拟人化，以努力了解它们。

examination_example.sentence: When Tim Joseph started his business, he found grass-fed <highlight>products</highlight> fell short of demand.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Tim Joseph 开始他的事业时，发现草饲产品供不应求。

examination_example.sentence: Electronic <highlight>products</highlight> contain valuable metals that could be recovered.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 电子产品中含有可回收利用的贵重金属。

word_usage.usage:
作为名词，product指任何体力或脑力劳动的产物，比如工业品、农产品；而production指生产的动作、产量、结果，特制诗歌、雕刻、绘画等文学艺术作品。
示例：This is a production of genius.
这是一部天才的作品。

sense_info_list.en: an article or substance that is manufactured or refined for sale

examination_example.sentence: These teams are trained annually using a framework known as the three PS: people, property, <highlight>product</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些团队每年都会在一个被称为“三P”的原则框架下进行培训，即生命、财产、产品。

examination_example.sentence: Indra Nooky, PepsiCo chairman, said the plan to make its <highlight>products</highlight> healthier was important for the company's growth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 百事公司董事长Indra Nooyi表示，让产品更健康的计划对公司的发展很重要。

examination_example.sentence: We can't do much to alter sedentary lifestyles, but we can provide consumers with great-tasting <highlight>products</highlight>, low in salt, sugar and fat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们不能为改变久坐的生活方式做很多事情，但是我们可以为消费者提供低盐，糖和脂肪含量低的美味产品。

examination_example.sentence: The maker of Mountain Dew and Gatorade has been one of the earlier movers in the industry to offer <highlight>products</highlight> with reduced levels of unhealthy ingredients.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 激浪(Mountain Dew)和佳得乐(Gatorad)的制造商是行业内较早提供减少不健康成分的产品的企业之一。

examination_example.sentence: "These digital <highlight>products</highlight> aren't just mechanisms for students to submit homework, they offer all kinds of features, "David Anderson, the executive director of higher education with the Association of American Publishers, told BuzzFeed News.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国出版商协会高等教育执行理事大卫·安德森(David Anderson)告诉 BuzzFeed News 说：“这些数字产品不仅是学生提交作业的一种机制，它们还具有各种功能。”

examination_example.sentence: The company said that 45% of its $ 140 million revenue in 2015 "was derived from digital <highlight>products</highlight>. "
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该公司表示，2015年其1.4亿美元收入中的45%“来自于数字产品”。

examination_example.sentence: People view economic success and wellbeing in life as a <highlight>product</highlight> of choice, willpower, and drive.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们认为经济上的成功和生活上的幸福是选择、意志力和动力的共同成果。

word_usage.usage:
作为名词，product指任何体力或脑力劳动的产物，比如工业品、农产品；而production指生产的动作、产量、结果，特制诗歌、雕刻、绘画等文学艺术作品。
示例：This is a production of genius.
这是一部天才的作品。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

n. 生产力；生产能力；繁殖力；生产率

word_family.mean: n. 作品；产品；积；结果；产物；物产；产儿

sense_info_list.en: an article or substance that is manufactured or refined for sale

examination_example.sentence: Art <highlight>products</highlight> differ from most other commercial <highlight>products</highlight> because they have both commercial and cultural values.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 艺术产品不同于大多数其他商业产品，因为它们具有商业和文化价值。

examination_example.sentence: Basically, it's "I've got to produce this <highlight>product</highlight> and then, at the end of year, present it to NASA."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 基本上，情况是“我必须生产这个产品，然后在年末，将它提交给美国国家航空航天局。”

examination_example.sentence: It's a hard business review of your <highlight>product</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一条对你的产品的艰难的商业评论。

examination_example.sentence: Nowadays China is getting better at making high-technology <highlight>products</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在中国在制造高科技产品方面做得越来越好。

examination_example.sentence: How long has Lee helped the local people sell their <highlight>products</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: Lee 帮助当地人销售他们的产品多久了？

examination_example.sentence: A business could raise the price of a <highlight>product</highlight> according to a person's age and feelings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 企业可以根据一个人的年龄和感受提高产品的价格。

word_usage.usage:
作为名词，product指任何体力或脑力劳动的产物，比如工业品、农产品；而production指生产的动作、产量、结果，特制诗歌、雕刻、绘画等文学艺术作品。
示例：This is a production of genius.
这是一部天才的作品。
